languages.text: "Хах! А ведь я обещал этому презренному мясорезу Тервантьясу, что увижу, как он подыхает! И не солгал... О, проклятье. Я же еще обещал помочиться на его труп!"
"Huh! I promised that despicable butcher Tervantias that I would watch him die! And I kept my promise... Oh, blast it all — I also swore to piss on his corpse!"
languages.original_text: "Хах! А ведь я обещал этому презренному мясорезу Тервантьясу, что увижу, как он подыхает! И не солгал... О, проклятье. Я же еще обещал помочиться на его труп!"

languages.text: “哈！我说过，我会亲眼看着那个叫特万提亚斯的屠夫是怎么死的！我遵守了我的诺言……哦，该死，我还发誓过要在他的尸体上撒尿来着！”
languages.original_text: "Huh! I promised that despicable butcher Tervantias that I would watch him die! And I kept my promise... Oh, blast it all — I also swore to piss on his corpse!"

traits.locale_text: “哈！我说过，我会亲眼看着那个叫特万提亚斯的屠夫是怎么死的！我遵守了我的诺言……哦，该死，我还发誓过要在他的尸体上撒尿来着！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Ha ! J'avais promis à ce misérable boucher de Tervantias que je le regarderais mourir ! Et j'ai tenu parole... Oh, bon sang ! J'avais aussi juré de pisser sur son cadavre ! »
languages.original_text: "Huh! I promised that despicable butcher Tervantias that I would watch him die! And I kept my promise... Oh, blast it all — I also swore to piss on his corpse!"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! J'avais promis à ce misérable boucher de Tervantias que je le regarderais mourir ! Et j'ai tenu parole... Oh, bon sang ! J'avais aussi juré de pisser sur son cadavre ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ja! ¡Le prometí a ese carnicero miserable de Tervantias que le vería morir! Y he cumplido mi promesa... ¡Maldita sea! ¡También le había prometido que me mearía en su cadáver!».
languages.original_text: "Huh! I promised that despicable butcher Tervantias that I would watch him die! And I kept my promise... Oh, blast it all — I also swore to piss on his corpse!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja! ¡Le prometí a ese carnicero miserable de Tervantias que le vería morir! Y he cumplido mi promesa... ¡Maldita sea! ¡También le había prometido que me mearía en su cadáver!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「はっ！俺はあのいけ好かない肉屋のテルヴァンティアスが死ぬところを見てやると誓ったんだ！誓いは果たすぞ…ああ、クソッタレ――奴の死体に小便もかけてやる！」
languages.original_text: "Huh! I promised that despicable butcher Tervantias that I would watch him die! And I kept my promise... Oh, blast it all — I also swore to piss on his corpse!"

traits.locale_text: 「はっ！俺はあのいけ好かない肉屋のテルヴァンティアスが死ぬところを見てやると誓ったんだ！誓いは果たすぞ…ああ、クソッタレ――奴の死体に小便もかけてやる！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Hm! Ich habe diesem widerwärtigen Schlächter Tervantias versprochen, dass ich ihn sterben sehe! Und ich habe mein Versprechen gehalten ... Ach, verflucht, ich habe auch versprochen, auf seine Leiche zu pissen!"
languages.original_text: "Huh! I promised that despicable butcher Tervantias that I would watch him die! And I kept my promise... Oh, blast it all — I also swore to piss on his corpse!"

traits.locale_text: "Hm! Ich habe diesem widerwärtigen Schlächter Tervantias versprochen, dass ich ihn sterben sehe! Und ich habe mein Versprechen gehalten ... Ach, verflucht, ich habe auch versprochen, auf seine Leiche zu pissen!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Huh! I promised that despicable butcher Tervantias that I would watch him die! And I kept my promise... Oh, blast it all — I also swore to piss on his corpse!"

languages.text: "Ha! O iğrenç kasap Tervantias'a ölümünü keyifle izleyeceğime söz vermiştim. Sözümü de tuttum. Kahretsin! Cesedinin üstüne işeyeceğime de söz vermiştim!"
languages.original_text: "Huh! I promised that despicable butcher Tervantias that I would watch him die! And I kept my promise... Oh, blast it all — I also swore to piss on his corpse!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah! O iğrenç kasap Tervantias'a ölümünü keyifle izleyeceğime söz vermiştim. Sözümü de tuttum. Ah, kahretsin! Cesedinin üstüne işeyeceğime de söz vermiştim!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
